algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by taking the product of the square root of the remaining capacity and the logarithm of the remaining capacity, divided by the square root of the item size. The algorithm aims to minimize the score to promote the utilization of bins with higher remaining capacity.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    remaining_capacity = bins - item
    scores = (np.sqrt(remaining_capacity) * np.log(remaining_capacity)) / np.sqrt(item)
    scores = np.where(remaining_capacity >= item, np.full_like(scores, np.inf), scores)
    return scores
